Name: Plantation Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Review: There's a spirit of Louisiana about this tropical punch.
History: Our Punch page details the history of Punch.
Nutrition: One serving of Plantation Punch contains 202 calories
